title: Snap Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A relaxed place offering Western food in District 2. You can get veggie breakfast with veggie sausages plus sandwiches, soups, falafel, samosas, hummus, dips, chips, pasta, and pizza. Frequented by internationals. Evening live music, sports on TV, quiz nights, pool, table tennis, foosball, and other games.
streetAddress: 32 Tran Ngoc Dien, Thao Dien, District 2
